Question
========

Gegeven is de volgende tabel

X 1 2 3 4
P(X = x) 0.2 0.3 0.3 0.2

De variantie van de kansvariabele X, Var(X), is 

Answerlist
----------
* 1.05
* 2.5
* 6.25

Solution
========

The correct answer is  1.05
